Post.title: SQL  - CH-3
Post._content:
#### 

SQL ************ SQL ** self join**

#### 



| name () | price () |
| -------------- | ------------ |
|            | 100          |
|            | 50           |
|            | 80           |

**** (ordered pair)****(unordered pair):

```sql
-- SQL
SELECT P1.name AS name_1, P2.name AS name_2
FROM Products P1 CROSS JOIN Products P2;
```

:

| name_1 | name_2 |
| ------ | ------ |
|    |    |
|    |    |
|    |    |
|    |    |
|    |    |
|    |    |
|    |    |
|    |    |
|    |    |

`` (Cartesian product)

```sql
-- 
SELECT P1.name AS name_1, P2.name AS name_2 FROM Products P1, Products P2;
```

()

```sql
--  SQL
SELECT P1.name AS name_1, P2.name AS name_2
FROM Products P1 INNER JOIN Products P2 ON P1.name <> P2.name;
```

:

| name_1 | name_2 |
| ------ | ------ |
|    |    |
|    |    |
|    |    |
|    |    |
|    |    |
|    |    |

> _ CROSS JOIN MYSQL  FROM table1, table2 

 WHERE  INNER JOIN  DBMS 

```sql
--  SQL
SELECT P1.name AS name_1, P2.name AS name_2
FROM Products P1, Products P2
WHERE P1.name <> P2.name;
```

 INNER JOIN ()()

```sql
--  SQL
SELECT P1.name AS name_1, P2.name AS name_2
FROM Products P1
INNER JOIN Products P2 ON P1.name > P2.name
```

:

| name_1 | name_2 |
| ------ | ------ |
|    |    |
|    |    |
|    |    |



```sql
--  SQL 
SELECT P1.name AS name_1,
       P2.name AS name_2,
       P3.name AS name_3,
FROM Products P1
INNER JOIN Products P2 ON P1.name > P2.name
INNER JOIN Products P3 ON P2.name > P3.name;
```

:

| name_1 | name_2 | name_3 |
| ------ | ------ | ------ |
|    |    |    |

 =  ><<> ********

#### 

 NULL Key

```sql
-- SQL
DELETE FROM Products P1
WHERE rowid < (SELECT MAX(P2.rowid)
FROM Products P2 WHERE P1.name = P2.name AND P1.price = P2.price);
```

 Key  MYSQL `_rowid`
 SQL 

####  Key 

| name () | family_id ( ID) | address ()             |
| ---------- | ------------------ | ------------------------- |
|      | 100                |  3-2-29 |
|      | 100                |  3-2-92 |
|      | 200                |  2-8-1  |
|      | 200                |  2-8-1  |
| Holmes     | 300                |  221B               |
| Watson     | 400                |  221B               |

 Key  ID Holmes  Watson ?

```sql
--  SQL
SELECT DISTINCT A1.name,A1.address
FROM Address A1 INNER JOIN Address A2 ON A1.family_id = A2.family_id
AND A1.address <> A2.address;
```

> 



| name () | price () |
| -------------- | ----------- |
|            | 50          |
|            | 100         |
|            | 50          |
|            | 80          |
|            | 30          |
|            | 100         |
|            | 100         |

```sql
--  SQL
SELECT DISTINCT A1.name,A1.price
FROM Product A1 INNER JOIN Product A2 ON A1.price = A2.price
AND A1.name <> A2.name
ORDER BY P1.price;
```

:

| name () | price () |
| -------------- | ----------- |
|            | 50          |
|            | 50          |
|            | 100         |
|            | 100         |
|            | 100         |

Post.title: SQL  - CH-11  SQL
Post._content:
## 

SQL  DB  SQL 

## 

#### 

 EXISTS  IN IN  IN  (1,2,3)  List  NOT IN  NOT EXISTS  EXISTS 

Class_A

| id () |name () |
| ----------| ------------ |
| 1 |  |
| 2 |  |
| 3 |  |

Class_B

| id () | name () |
| --------- | ------------ |
| 1 |  |
| 2 |  |
| 4 |  |

 Class_A  Class_B 

```sql
-- 
SELECT * FROM Class_A WHERE id IN ( SELECT id FROM Class_B);
```

```sql
-- 
SELECT * FROM Class_A A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT id FROM Class_B B WHERE A.id = B.id );
```

:

| id () | name () |
| --------- | ------------ |
| 1 |  |
| 2 |  |

```sql
--  EXISTS ?
1. key Class_B 
2. EXISTS  IN 
```

####  IN

 IN  EXISTS 

```sql
SELECT A.id,A.name FROM Class_A A INNER JOIN Class_B B ON A.id = B.id;
```

## 

SQL  DBMS  DBMS  DBMS 

:

1. GROUP BY
2. ORDER BY
3.  (SUMCOUNTAVGMAXMIN)
4. DISTINCT
5. UNIONINTERSECTEXCEPT
6.  (RANK ROW_NUMBER)

####  ALL 

SQL  UNIONINTERSECTEXCEPT 

```sql
SELECT * FROM Class_A
UNION
SELECT * FROM Class_B;
```

:

| id () | name () |
| --------- | ------------ |
| 1 |  |
| 2 |  |
| 3 |  |
| 4 |  |

 UNION ALL 

####  EXISTS  DISTINCT

DISTINCT  DISTINCT  EXISTS 

Items

| item_no|item |
| ----------| ------------ |
| 10| SD  |
| 20 | CD-R |
| 30 | USB |
| 40 | DVD|

SalesHistory

| sale_date | item_no | quantity |
| --------- | ------------ | ------------ |
| 2020-10-01 | 10 | 4 |
| 2020-10-01 | 20 | 10 |
| 2020-10-01 | 30 | 3 |
| 2020-10-03 | 10 | 32 |
| 2020-10-03 | 30 | 12 |
| 2020-10-04 | 20 | 22 |
| 2020-10-04 | 30 | 7 |

 IN 

```sql
SELECT I.item_no FROM Items I INNER JOIN SalesHistory SH ON I.item_no = SH.item_no;
```

:

| item_no |
| --------- |
| 10|
| 10|
| 20|
| 20|
| 30|
| 30|
| 30|

 DISTINCT  EXISTS

```sql
SELECT item_no FROM Items I WHERE EXISTS(
    SELECT * FROM SalesHistory SH WHERE I.item_no = SH.item_no
);
```

##  MAX / MIN 

SQL MAX  MIN 

```sql
-- 
SELECT MAX(item) FROM Items
```

```sql
-- 
SELECT MAX(item_no) FROM Items
```

 item_no 

##  WHERE  HAVING 

```sql
SELECT sale_date, SUM(quantity)
FROM SalesHistory 
GROUP BY sale_date HAVING sale_date = '2007-10-01';
```

```sql
SELECT sale_date, SUM(quantity)
FROM SalesHistory WHERE sale_date = '2007-10-01'
GROUP BY sale_date;
```

:

| sale_date | sum (quantity)|
| --------- | -----
| 2007-10-01 | 17 |

 GROUP BY  WHERE sale_date 

#### GROUP BY  ORDER BY 

 UNIQUE 


## ?

 C 

1. 

2.  Explain  SQL https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000008131735 

3. : SELECT * FROM user WHERE sex = 0 ( 0  ) MYSQL  MYSQL 

4. 

5. 

6. 

#### 

```sql
--  NO
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1 * 1.1 > 100;

--  OK
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1 > 100 / 1.1
```



```sql
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE SUBSTR(col_1, 1, 1) = 'a';
```



* 

#### NULL

 NULL  IS NULL  IS NOT NULL NULL  IS NOT NULL 

```sql
-- IS NOT NULL 
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1 > 0;
```

#### 


* <>
* !=
* NOT IN



```sql
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1 <> 100;
```

####  OR 

 col_1  col_2  col_1, col_2  OR  AND 

```sql
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1 > 1 OR col_2 = 'abc';
```

#### 

 col_1, col_2, col_3 

```sql
-- O 
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1  10 AND col_2 = 100 AND col_3 = 500;
-- O 
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1  10 AND col_2 = 100;
-- X 
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1  10 AND col_3 = 500;
-- X 
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_2  100 AND col_3 = 500;
```

 DB 

#### LIKE

```sql
-- X 
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1 LIKE '%10' ;
-- X 
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1 LIKE '%10%' ;
-- O 
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1 LIKE '10%' ;
```

#### 

 col_1 

```sql
-- X 
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1 = 10 ;
-- O 
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1 = '10' ;
-- O 
SELECT * FROM SomeTable WHERE col_1 = CAST(10,AS CHAR(2));
```

## 

SQL  SQL 

```sql
SELECT * FROM(
    SELECT sale_date, MAX(quantity) AS max_qty FROM SalesHistory GROUP BY sale_date
) TMP --
WHERE max_qty >= 10;
```

 HAVING 

```sql
SELECT sale_date, MAX(quantity) AS max_qty FROM SalesHistory GROUP BY sale_date HAVING MAX(quantity) >= 10;
```
HAVING  WHERE 

## IN KEY  KEY 

 SQL-92  =<>  IN  LIST Key  IN 

```sql
SELECT id, state, city FROM Address1 A1 
WHERE 
status IN(
    SELECT status FROM Address2 A2 WHERE A1.id = A2.id      
) AND city IN (
    SELECT city FROM Address2 A2 WHERE A1.id = A2.id      
)
```

```sql
SELECT * FROM Address1 A1 WHERE id || status || city IN(
    SELECT id || state || city FROM Address1 A2);
)
```

 DB IN 

```sql
SELECT * FROM Address1 A1 WHERE (id, status, city) IN(
    SELECT id , state , city FROM Address1 A2);
)
```



## 




## 

SQL 

#### 

    1. IN EXISTS
    2.
    3.SQL 
    4.
    5.

: 

1. SQL 

2. https://ithelp.ithome.com.tw/articles/10221971

Post.title: SQL  - CH-18 GROUP BY  PARTITION BY
Post._content:
#### ?

- group by: 

- partition by: 

SQL  SQL 

 SQL  GROUP BY  PARTITION BY KEY  GROUP BY  PARTITION BY 



Teams

| member | team | age |
| ------ | ---- | --- |
|    | A    | 28  |
|    | A    | 19  |
|    | A    | 23  |
|    | B    | 40  |
|    | B    | 29  |
|    | C    | 30  |
|    | D    | 28  |
|    | D    | 28  |
|    | D    | 24  |
|    | D    | 22  |

 GROUP BY  PARTITION BY Teams SUM RANK 

```sql
SELECT member,team,age,
RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY team ORDER BY age DESC) rn,
DENSE_RANK()  OVER(PARTITION BY team ORDER BY age DESC) dense_rn,
ROW_NUMBER()  OVER(PARTITION BY team ORDER BY age DESC) row_num
FROM Teams
ORDER BY team, rn
```

:

| member | team | age | rn  | dense_rn | row_num |
| ------ | ---- | --- | --- | -------- | ------- |
|    | A    | 28  | 1   | 1        | 1       |
|    | A    | 23  | 2   | 2        | 2       |
|    | A    | 19  | 3   | 3        | 3       |
|    | B    | 40  | 1   | 1        | 1       |
|    | B    | 29  | 2   | 2        | 2       |
|    | C    | 30  | 1   | 1        | 1       |
|    | D    | 28  | 1   | 1        | 1       |
|    | D    | 28  | 1   | 1        | 2       |
|    | D    | 24  | 3   | 2        | 3       |
|    | D    | 22  | 4   | 3        | 4       |

 286
